synopsis.text: Soraâ€™s romantic entanglement with his older sister, Aki, intensifies, even amidst the constant presence of their family. Meanwhile, Nami, Sora's twin sister, harbors deep affection for her friend Kana, who, in an ironic twist, is smitten with Sora. This complex web of emotions forces Sora to grapple with the morality and future of his incestuous relationship with Aki. Unbeknownst to their unsuspecting mother, Aki and Sora continue their forbidden liaison, finding pleasure in mundane activities like cooking dinner or nursing an illness. Meanwhile, Nami remains steadfast in her pursuit of Kana, oblivious to the fact that Kana's heart yearns for Sora. As Sora navigates this emotional labyrinth, he must confront the reality of his feelings for Aki and the potential consequences of their relationship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
